title: Everyday English Course 52
description: Improve your English comprehension skills through short everyday conversations and situational dialogues.

M: Of course. Sorry. I didn't realize you could hear it. You want me to call the doctor?
W: No, thanks. I'll be OK in a minute.
{a}
